text:
-2-
January 9 - Script editor and producer in educational radio station wants
switch to educational station that has close operational connection with
a school or college. Male, 41, married, M..A . Location, salary, open.
January 10 - Man with B.S. in speech and radio, M.S. in administra¬
tion and supervision. 7 years educational and commercial experience
in radio-TV, audio-visual instruction and movie production. Licensed
teacher and supervisor in New York State. Now employed in motion
picture production and distribution. Married, 37, location open. $7000.
January 11 - Male, 41, married, M.A. 4 years producer of in-school TV
programs wants responsible ETV management position. Location open.
$8000.
January 12 - Radio-TV executive, male, 39, single, M.A., complete
knowledge programming and production. 17 years in commercial, propa¬
ganda and educational broadcasting, 8 years in New York. Wants prod¬
ucer-director position in ETV on a campus. Will teach. Location open.
$7000.
January 13 - Teacher with 25 years classroom experience, 14 years in
radio-TV, wants writer-director, news director, program director position
in educational broadcasting. Will teach. Male, 49, B.S., married.
Prefers Eastern location. $6500.
January 14 - Male, 31, married, M.A., with experience in commercial
writing and teaching. Wants educational broadcasting in New York as
a writer. $6000.
January 15 - Male, 36, EdD., married, producer in ETV station wants
administrative position in same field. Location open. $7500.
January 16 - Young man with some experience in commercial radio prod¬
uction and is familiar with production aspects of TV wants position as
ETV production assistant. Married, 26, B.F.A. Location open. $55/wk.
January 17 - TV producer, 7 years in commercial TV and producer of
multi-national network shows, live and film, also U.S. and European
radio background, wants producer-director position in ETV. Male, 32,
married, B.A. Location open but prefers with a university. $7000.
January 18 - Radio-TV director in ETV at a small college desires program
director or producer-director position in ETV. Male, married, 3S, M.A.
Location open. $3800.
